meanings.sent1: The heavy box required a strong pushdown to move it.
meanings.sent2: The pushdown of the weight on the scale showed the exact measurement.
meanings.sent3: The pushdown of the rain on the umbrella made a soothing sound.
meanings.sent4: The pushdown of emotions overwhelmed her like a tidal wave.
meanings.sent5: The pushdown of the hammer on the nail echoed in the room.

meanings.definition: A type of mechanical device used to push something down.
meanings.sent1: The pushdown in the car engine helped regulate the airflow.
meanings.sent2: She used the pushdown on the toaster to make her toast crispy.
meanings.sent3: The pushdown on the button activated the machine with a beep.
meanings.sent4: The pushdown of the lever released the trapdoor with a click.
meanings.sent5: The pushdown of the handle locked the door securely.

meanings.definition: A decrease in value or level.
meanings.sent1: The pushdown in the stock market affected many investors.
meanings.sent2: The pushdown in temperature signaled the arrival of winter.
meanings.sent3: The pushdown in prices at the store made her smile with joy.
meanings.sent4: The pushdown in morale among the team was concerning.
meanings.sent5: The pushdown in energy levels made her feel tired and drained.

meanings.definition: The act of moving something downward with force.
meanings.sent1: With a quick pushdown, he closed the stubborn drawer.
meanings.sent2: The pushdown of the lever released the trapdoor with a click.
meanings.sent3: She gave the pushdown on the seesaw to lift her friend up high.
meanings.sent4: The pushdown of the button activated the fireworks display.
meanings.sent5: The pushdown of the pedal accelerated the bike down the hill.
